abstract: Scientists unearth winged dinosaur skeleton in China; new species, named Zhenyuanlong suni, is close cousin of dinosaur predator Velociraptor.
lead_paragraph: A nearly complete, new dinosaur fossil has been discovered in China, the first in its family to have unusually short feathered wings.

headline.main: China: Scientists Unearth Winged Dinosaur Skeleton
headline.print_headline: Asia; China: Scientists Unearth Winged Dinosaur Skeleton

snippet: A nearly complete, new dinosaur fossil has been discovered in China, the first in its family to have unusually short feathered wings.
